Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: AI does not innovate, it only extracts rather than creating things out of nothing. It helps only for proof-reading. Teachers can do all the above

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Teacher feedbacks are based on experience and detailed. AI feedback is mostly vague and not insightful
